mapper.select: select pa.id,pr.product_name AS productName,pr.version,app.system_type AS systemType, pa.download_url AS downloadUrl,pa.download_total AS downloadTotal, pa.download_complete AS completeNum,pa.sizes AS 'size', u.name AS userName,pa.create_time AS createTime, pa.start_time AS startTime,pa.end_time AS endTime, pa.update_description AS updateDescription, pa.force_update AS constraintUpdate, pa.update_brief AS updateBrief from packages pa LEFT JOIN applications app ON app.id=pa.application_id LEFT JOIN projects pr ON pr.id=app.project_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id=pa.user_id where 1=1 AND pa.delete_flag=0 AND pa.id=#{id} order by pa.create_time
mapper.update: UPDATE packages SET download_complete=download_complete+1 where id=#{id}
